style.name: skin_iconloadpanorama
style.onclick: if(linkedscene, tween(scale,0.25,0.5); tween(oy,-20,0.5); tween(alpha,0,0.5); looktohotspot(); loadscene(get(linkedscene),null,MERGE,BLEND(1)); skin_updatescroll(); );

style.name: skin_hotspotstyle
style.onclick: if(linkedscene, tween(scale,0.25,0.5); tween(oy,-20,0.5); tween(alpha,0,0.5); looktohotspot(); loadscene(get(linkedscene),null,MERGE,BLEND(1);); skin_updatescroll(); ); js(setTitle(get(linkedscene)));

style.name: draghotspot
style.ondown: spheretoscreen(ath, atv, hotspotcenterx, hotspotcentery); sub(drag_adjustx, mouse.stagex, hotspotcenterx); sub(drag_adjusty, mouse.stagey, hotspotcentery); asyncloop(pressed, sub(dx, mouse.stagex, drag_adjustx); sub(dy, mouse.stagey, drag_adjusty); screentosphere(dx, dy, ath, atv); );

style.name: tooltip
tooltip_wiki

krpano.action: set(layer[skin_loadingtext].visible, %1);
txtadd(defaultcrop, "0|0|", get(framewidth), "|", get(frameheight)); set(crop, get(defaultcrop));
